actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-1119.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3795) to harmonize, reduce, and eliminate barriers to trade in wine on a basis which assures substantially equivalent competitive opportunities for all wine moving in international trade.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3795 (wine exports).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3795) to harmonize, reduce, and eliminate barriers to trade in wine on a basis which assures substantially equivalent competitive opportunities for all wine moving in international trade.
